title: Small cars will be big again, says Maruti Suzuki
description: Maruti Suzuki anticipates a recovery in small car sales due to economic growth. The company aims to capitalize on this trend by introducing new models to cater to diverse customer segments and enhance vehicular safety standards. Small-car sales fell 12% in FY24.
